https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tnHyCB532sEFfC9Jubd9gigxdb9.jpg An investigation into the ongoing threat caused by the phenomenon of “fake news” in the U.S., focusing on the real-life consequences that disinformation, conspiracy theories and false news stories have on the average citizen. After Truth: Disinformation and the Cost of Fake News
